if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 8921 && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == taskID) { MaxHit *= 1.15; }
but when i log on server it goes
null
null
null
can anyone help me fix the code? (yes i did add it in the calculatemaxhit method)
im using delta
